fields.fieldText: Please help us understand how or if AI played a role in Retool winning this deal:

screens.name: Cannot_Close_Opportunity_Private_Offer_Pending
screens.label: Cannot Close Opportunity: Private Offer Pending

fields.name: error_private_offer
fields.fieldText:
You cannot close this deal because it includes terms for payment using ({!recordId.Contract.Marketplace_Terms_Marketplace_Name__c} and we have not yet received confirmation of an accepted private offer from the customer.


Please work with the partner team in #deal-marketplace-updates to obtain an accepted private offer for this deal.


Learn more about the process for selling deals paid using a cloud marketplace

fields.fieldText: Close Date

fields.name: alert_private_offer

fields.name: Block_CW_admin

fields.fieldText: Collect expansion/contraction reasons?

fields.name: CW_blocked_header
fields.fieldText:
You cannot close this opportunity because Closed Won has been blocked by Revenue Operations for the following reason:


{!recordId.Ops_Notes__c}


Please reach out to Revenue Operations for assistance.

fields.name: CW_blocked_header_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot close this opportunity because Closed Won has been blocked by Revenue Operations for the following reason:


{!Get_global_permissions.Reason__c}


Please reach out to Revenue Operations for assistance.

fields.name: CW_blocked_header_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Won because there is an open technical evaluation.


Please work the assigned Sales Engineer ({!recordId.Technical_Evaluation__r.Owner:User.FirstName} {!recordId.Technical_Evaluation__r.Owner:User.LastName}) to resolve this technical evaluation before proceeding.

fields.name: CW_blocked_header_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: This deal is already in the process of closing. Please refresh the page.

fields.name: contraction_reason_Header
fields.fieldText: This customer is contracting by ${!recordId.New_Annualized_Revenue__c} as part of this renewal. Please help us understand why they chose to reduce their spend with Retool:

fields.name: Contraction_Reason
fields.fieldText: Contraction Reason(s): (select all that apply)

fields.name: Contraction_Reason_Details
fields.fieldText: Contraction Reason Details:

fields.name: Not_Signed_Error
fields.fieldText:
The Contract Proposal Status has not been marked as 'signed' in SFDC.


If this is a deal that was signed outside of RevOps CPQ and you have already uploaded the agreement, please wait a minute before trying again.


If you are still encountering an error, please reach out to the Revenue Operations Team in the #last-mile-deal-review channel.

fields.name: error_line_items
fields.fieldText: Cannot close opportunity: This opportunity is missing line items. Please reach out to Sales Operations.

fields.name: expansion_reason_Header_0
fields.fieldText: This customer is expanding by ${!recordId.New_Annualized_Revenue__c}. Please help us understand why they chose to grow their spend with Retool:

fields.name: expansion_Reasons_pick
fields.fieldText: Expansion Reason(s): (select all that apply)

fields.name: Expansion_Reason_Details
fields.fieldText: Expansion Reason Details:

fields.name: Almost_There_Text
fields.fieldText: Almost there! Please click 'Next' to finalize the Close Won automations.

fields.name: deal_review_note
fields.fieldText:
Note: This deal was closed outside of the RevOps signature process and therefore requires a final Deal Desk review before you are able to move to Closed Won. The deal desk team has {!deal_desk_notified_text} been notified in #last-mile-deal-review.


They will let you know when you are cleared to move the deal to Closed Won.

fields.name: marketplace_fulfilment_headerf
fields.fieldText: This deal is being fulfilled using {!recordId.Contract.Marketplace_Terms_Marketplace_Name__c}

fields.name: marketplace_influence_reason
fields.fieldText: Select the reason(s) why this deal was transacted using a cloud marketplace:

fields.name: marketplace_influence_Reason_details
fields.fieldText: Provide any additional context about why we used the marketplace for this deal:

fields.name: meddicc_update_header
fields.fieldText: Please help us understand and improve our GTM strategy and sales processes by completing all Value Framework fields before proceeding:

fields.name: Qualification
fields.fieldText: Qualification

fields.name: CVF_Helper
fields.fieldText:
Customer Value Framework:


  • Before Scenarios: A use case / initiative to build / rebuild some operations workflow
  • Negative Consequences: Pain (or gain) with urgency / intent to resolve aligned to one of our Value Drivers
  • Stakeholder who is an influencer

fields.name: screen_before_scenarios2
fields.fieldText: Before Scenarios

fields.name: screen_negative_consequences2
fields.fieldText: Negative Consequences

fields.name: screen_Value_Driver_s
fields.fieldText: Value Driver(s)

fields.name: Discovery
fields.fieldText: Discovery

fields.name: discovert_CVF
fields.fieldText:
Customer Value Framework:


  • Any pre-existing Retool product knowledge / customer experience / technical expertise
  • Top 1-3 Use Cases that tie to core Positive Business Outcomes
  • Validated technical feasibility
  • Champion: Suspected or potential 
  • Competition: How they would solve the identified pain (or gain) without Retool (i.e. what is their alternative?)
  • Differentiators: How Retool is uniquely & comparatively positioned to win against the identified competitors

fields.name: screen_Use_Cases2
fields.fieldText: Use Cases

fields.name: screen_After_Scenarios2
fields.fieldText: After Scenarios

fields.name: screen_Positive_Business_Outcomes2
fields.fieldText: Positive Business Outcomes

fields.name: screen_competition
fields.fieldText: [C] Competition
fields.helpText: The name(s) of any other solutions that the prospect was seriously evaluating as part of the sales process.

fields.name: competition_select_footer
fields.fieldText: Hold ⌘ and click to select multiple competitors

fields.name: screen_Differentiator_s
fields.fieldText: Differentiator(s)

fields.name: Negotiation
fields.fieldText: Negotiation

fields.name: negotiation_header
fields.fieldText:
Customer Verifiable Outcomes﻿


  • Decision Process: Agreement on a specific validation approach to prove out use cases or required capabilities as well as supporting success metrics
  • Economic Buyer identified, path to engage with them, and preliminary understanding of their priorities and approach to quantify them
  • Validation the champion is a true champion 
  • Preliminary pricing discussed & deemed feasible
  • Understanding of competitive landscape and shape evaluation criteria 
  • Customer agrees to commit necessary resources (e.g., infrastructure or personnel) for technical validation
  • Paper Process: Agreement on all key business, legal, and other deal requirements

fields.name: screen_D_Decision_Process2
fields.fieldText: [D] Decision Process

fields.name: screen_Required_Capabilities2
fields.fieldText: Required Capabilities

fields.name: screen_Metrics2
fields.fieldText: Metrics

fields.name: screen_P_Paper_Process2
fields.fieldText: [P] Paper Process

fields.name: missing_services_note
fields.fieldText: This is a {!recordId.Subtype__c} deal for a self-hosted deployment of Retool without any attached professional services. All new self-hosted committed customers are required to purchase professional services.

fields.name: Missing_Services_Reason_screen
fields.fieldText: What is the primary reason why this deal was sold without attached services?

fields.name: missing_services_reason_details
fields.fieldText: Please provide additional context about why this deal was sold without attached Professional Services:

fields.name: Survey_Header
fields.fieldText: Congratulations on closing {!Entity_Name}! Please answer the following questions so the success team has a clear understanding of the customer’s success criteria:

fields.name: Survey_Subheader
fields.fieldText: {!Entity_Name} qualifies for the {!cs_tier_setting.DeveloperName} customer success tier. {!cs_tier_setting.DE_Assignment_SLA_Comment__c}

value.stringValue: Who is the Launch Point of Contact (POC)? (defaults to deal champion)

fields.name: Enroll_customer_in_onboarding_email_campaign
fields.fieldText: Enroll Launch POC in onboarding email campaign?

fields.name: email_opt_in_header
fields.fieldText: By default, the Launch POC for customers assigned to the Digital success tier are enrolled in a 6-week onboarding email campaign. If you would like to opt them out of this campaign, please uncheck the box above.

fields.name: External_Header
fields.fieldText:
-------------------------- Shared With Launch POC --------------------------

Answers to the below questions will be shared with the Launch POC

fields.name: What_is_the_customer_s_target_activation_date
fields.fieldText: What is the customer's target activation date?
fields.helpText: The Activation Date is the date that the customer expects the first use case to go live in production.

fields.name: What_use_cases_are_on_the_customer_s_roadmap
fields.fieldText: What use cases are on the customer's roadmap?

fields.name: What_is_the_customer_s_success_criteria
fields.fieldText: What are the customer's success criteria for their initial use cases?

fields.name: Internal_Header
fields.fieldText: ----------------------------- Internal Use Only -----------------------------

fields.name: Who_are_the_key_players_main_builders
fields.fieldText: Who are the key players / main builders?
fields.helpText: List the names of any Retool champions, economic buyers, and key builders.

fields.name: In_what_time_zone_are_the_primary_Retool_builders_located
fields.fieldText: In what time zone are the primary Retool builders located?
fields.helpText: Knowing where the main builders are located will help us assign a DE with overlapping working hours.

fields.name: To_make_the_case_to_assign_a_DE_to_this_customer_please_identify_growth_opportun
fields.fieldText: Please identify growth opportunities you expect in the next 3-6 months:

fields.name: Did_identify_any_notable_risks_during_the_sales_process_or_evaluation
fields.fieldText: Did we identify any notable risks to a production deployment during the sales process or technical evaluation?

fields.name: Technical_Profficiency
fields.fieldText: How technically proficient are the primary Retool builders?

fields.name: proficiency_help
fields.fieldText:
High: Builders are experienced with Retool and do not require assistance beyond documentation.

Medium: Builders require some assistance from Retool to begin building.

Low: Builders need significant assistance in order to begin or may require professional services

fields.name: Is_there_any_additional_context_about_the_builders
fields.fieldText: Is there any additional context about the builders that the success team should know?

fields.name: How_does_the_customer_view_Retool_and_our_long_term_impact_on_their_business
fields.fieldText: How does the customer view Retool and our long-term impact on their business?

fields.name: customer_pov_help
fields.fieldText:
Prototyping: Retool is a way to prototype applications that ultimately get built elsewhere.

Point Solution: Retool is a solution for a single key use case.

Platform: Retool is the way internal tools are built.

fields.name: Is_there_anything_else_we_should_know_to_ensure_a_successful_onboarding
fields.fieldText: Is there anything else the success team should know to ensure a successful onboarding?
fields.helpText: Add any additional information (or link to deal notes) that will be helpful for the success team to know while onboarding this customer.

fields.name: upload_contract
fields.fieldText:
This deal may have been signed outside of RevOps. To proceed to Closed Won, please perform the following steps first:


1) Click here to open the deal in RevOps

2) On the left side of the screen click to open the Deal Progress section

3) Click Upload to upload a PDF of the fully executed agreement

4) Once complete, close the modal and wait about 2 minutes for our systems to synchronize. Then attempt to move to Closed Won again.
